DUBAI - Iranian President Hassan Rouhani said on Monday that Iran was committed to solving a dispute over Tehran 's nuclear program through negotiations , despite the little progress achieved in the latest round of talks in Vienna last week .
We will pursue this right of our people , he said , according to official state media IRNA .

A1: talks had been slow and difficult
RelatedSentence: Iran and the United States said the talks had been slow and difficult , raising doubts over prospects for a breakthrough by a July 20 deadline for a final deal , although they agreed on more discussions next month .

Iran and the United States said the talks had been slow and difficult , raising doubts over prospects for a breakthrough by a July 20 deadline for a final deal , although they agreed on more discussions next month .

An interim deal between Iran and the five permanent members of the U.N. Security Council plus Germany was reached in November in Geneva , aimed at persuading Iran to curb parts of its nuclear work , in return for a limited easing of sanctions .
